storyInfo: The Lord of Long Spring is tyrannical and difficult to communicate with. She orders the expulsion of the Rhodes Island Operators as well as Team Rainbow, and takes the Infected away.

attributes.content: How long has it been, dear sister?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Drudge, you attacked the Lord's men and stormed his manor. This is treason!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: If it weren't for that rotting old man's obsession with protecting his infected... oh, distressed assets.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: This wouldn't even be your place.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Check out these toys from an enthusiastic Columbian donor.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.text: The cunning Reproba slaps the device behind him.

attributes.content: The TSW-2 Ultrasonic Impact Unit, a product of advanced technology. It's experimental, never used in the field before. The only downside is the size.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: It was real tough to hide in town. Took a while.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Took me a while to get you out of the mansion too.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: So tell me, my dearest little sister, what good are your sick moves now? What good is that iron will of yours?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: And check out my friends here. Sarkaz friends.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: They're not your run-of-the-mill braindead devils. They're from Columbia too. They get the job done.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: It means they're here for progress. Progress you and the old man could never understand.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Get your margins high enough and money's more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Whatever happened to the old man's worthless logic?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Boss, we found this in a big house.
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Oh, an appointment letter from the Lord Ameer of Bayalir.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Fine grain papyrus, embossed signature, blocky Bayalir writing, and this black seal.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: He wasn't there. We searched every room and found plenty of townsfolk, but not the old man you're talking about.
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Father is dead. I am the Lord of Long Spring now.
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: You have disobeyed your Lord, and in so doing disobeyed the Lord Ameer, and for that your punishment is death!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: That's the plan you and the old man came up with?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: This is getting stupid. You really think you can use the Lord Ameer to outmaneuver me? Don't make me laugh.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: The old man's proud Reproba guards are lying headless in an alley somewhere right now.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Those tough guards are gone now, and who's left to stop me?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You're a psychotic piece of shit! You grew up with them! They treated you like their own son! I didn't think you were this far gone...
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: They shouldn't have gotten in my way.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: We're blood, so let me make it a little clearer for you, sis. I wanna be sure you understand.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Yes, you're a Lord of Sargon now. Sure.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: But me? I'm a bum, abandoned by my family.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: And in a few years, when you meet an unfortunate end, I'll go to the Court of Bayalir.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: With my pedigree, plus the resources and wealth to prove my loyalty to the Lord Ameer, do you think he might just hand Long Spring back to me?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Why don't I give you another scenario: let's say you die in battle just a short while after taking charge.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Then I hand your corpse over to the Lord Ameer, and get to join the Zhayedan, would that work out better for me?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Drudge, you're a disgusting, horrific, disaster of a person!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: All that's just hypothetical. It's not real. We're having a brother-sister talk here.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Because I know a much better place for you.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: See these things with the rocks on them?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: If you're so eager to protect the Infected, why not join 'em?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Once you die from it, I'll find a nice cave to bury you in.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Then you and the old man can watch me dig out the Originium buried under the mines and turn Long Spring into the mineral heart of Bayalir.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: ...You sold out your family, and sold out our land! I curse you, Drudge. May you die a horrible death!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: Whatever makes you happy, sis. Curse away. Use that voice while you've still got it.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: (Columbian) Bring the Infected to the egghead.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: (Columbian) What about this kid? Looks like he's on his way out.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Columbian) Turn her Infected. You Sarkaz must know how to do it.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: (Columbian) But that isn't in our contract. There'll be an extra fee.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Columbian) Save it. You know there'll be plenty of money to go around once our work here is done and the mine is up and running.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: What a nice brother you have there.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We're under attack! Get a shield up, protect the boss!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: I thought you took care of all the guardsmen!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Fall back. They've got crossbows. Get to cover!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Cover Drudge! We can't let anything happen to him!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hmph, the old man's toys can only be useful at a time like this.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: You, take the monsters and finish them off.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: There's too many. I can't guarantee your safe escape.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's my fault Drudge turned out like this.
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: I can't face my late father...
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: But I will carve out that traitor's heart and bury it in Long Spring if it's the last thing I do!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: Don't be hasty, there's too many of them. Getting yourself killed won't help the town survive.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I've sent out the signal. They should be here in a minute.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Boss! Those mercenaries and Rhodes Island are assaulting us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What are you afraid of? With this mansion tough as iron, I don't believe those mercenaries can cause us any harm.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Tell those casters to finish that Feline with monsters. Others go defend the entrance.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: They have formed a defensive line with the courtyard walls. I suppose there are snipers and hulky mercenaries hiding behind.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: A wall like this doesn't even bother me.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Let's show them who's the real boss here.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Now that's a big hole in the wall. I didn't expect a technology like this.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Bastards! Where the hell are the snipers?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Snipers? There's no more snipers I'm afraid.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: We've breached the out wall. Nicely done, old man.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Don't let your guard down. There's still many of them.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Wait... what's that thing they just pushed out?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.text: The ruthless experimental weapon produced a powerful shock wave with a loud bang resounding throughout the sky. The debris of broken buildings splashed everywhere.

attributes.content: All fine. but now I feel everywhere hurts...
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: How come they even have stuff like this?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: An experimental weapon of Volvort Kochinski... How unexpected.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's about to fire again. Find cover!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: If it hits you, you'll be doomed for sure.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Boss! They've breached the out wall!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't you see they are being suppressed? What are you worried about?
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Take care of my sister and that Feline first. Then we'll deal with the rest.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: I'm having the edge. Now it's just a matter of killing a few more.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: Five! These are your monsters, huh? Drudge! Get out and face me!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: Six! C'mon, You ugly and filthy monsters! I'm gonna smash you all into shreds!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: Calm down, Lady Picale. Save your strength.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You... *cough* *cough*... have to get out of here!
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.text: When you're Infected, every sunrise comes with the specter of death.
Miarow remembers these words by heart.

attributes.content: (Where am I...? Did I pass out?)
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: ...You sold out your family, and sold out our land! I curse you, Drudge. May you die a horrible death!
attributes.name: Picale

attributes.content: (Columbian) Bring the Infected to the egghead.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: (Columbian) What about this kid? Looks like he's on his way out.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Columbian) Turn her Infected. You Sarkaz must know how to do it.
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: (He... What is he doing to the Infected?)
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.text: In the shadow of the mansion's courtyard wall, a long crossbow takes aim.

attributes.content: (Hah... It all comes down to this, in the end.)
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Leave me alone! Get out of here!
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: Is that a refined Originium Ingot?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I haven't used... Arts... in so long.
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.text: 'Arts that make Originium products explode? That's rare.'
'With Arts like these, aren't you a better fit for being a soldier? Why do you want to be a doctor?'
'*Sigh*... Okay, whatever. I just think it's kind of a waste though.'

attributes.content: (There's so much I still want to do.)
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: (A doctor should be saving lives. I have to... save...)
attributes.name: Miarow

attributes.content: The Originiutants! They're out of control!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: We've completely lost control! What do we do?!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Get a shield up, protect the boss!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I want their heads on a platter now!
attributes.name: Drudge

attributes.content: We're getting them out of there. Open fire!
attributes.name: Ash
